metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12625 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4. There is a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in rcube_washtml.php because JavaScript code can occur in the CDATA of an HTML message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-core - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-mysql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-pgsql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-plugins - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2').
